briefdescription.para: Registers the trigger source for an ADC.

para.verbatim: This will only be applied when ADC is started. If ADC is already started, it must be stopped then started again.

parameterdescription.para: Number of the ADC to configure.

briefdescription.para: Registers the discontinuous count for an ADC.

para.verbatim: This will only be applied when ADC is started. If ADC is already started, it must be stopped then started again.

parameterdescription.para: Number of the ADC to configure.
Number of channels to acquire on each trigger event. 0 to disable discontinuous mode (default).

briefdescription.para: Adds a channel to the list of channels to be acquired for an ADC. The order in which channels are added determine the order in which they will be acquired.

detaileddescription.para: This will only be applied when ADC is started. If ADC is already started, it must be stopped then started again.

parameterdescription.para: Number of the ADC to configure.
Number of the channel to to be acquired.

briefdescription.para: Removes a channel from the list of channels that are acquired by an ADC. If a channel has been added multiple times, then only the first occurrence in the list will be removed.

detaileddescription.para: This will only be applied when ADC is started. If ADC is already started, it must be stopped then started again.

parameterdescription.para: Number of the ADC to configure.
Number of the channel to to no longer be acquired.

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of enabled channels for an ADC.

parameterdescription.para: Number of the ADC to fetch.

simplesect.para: Number of enabled channels on the given ADC.

briefdescription.para: Configures an ADC to use DMA.

para.verbatim: This will only be applied when ADC is started. If ADC is already started, it must be stopped then started again.

parameterdescription.para: Number of the ADC to configure.
Set to true to use DMA for this ADC, false to not use it (default).

inbodydescription.para: Pre-enable configuration Nothing here for now. If some channels have to be set as differential, or ADCs have to be set as dual mode, this should be done here.

briefdescription.para: This function triggers a single conversion in the case of a software triggered ADC.

detaileddescription.para: This function must only be called after ADC has been started.
